messages.subject: Use the list right, please, or don't use it.
messages.msgSnippet: NOTE:  You can t forward things to this group. If you have something to tell us about your own unschooling life, please
messages.messageBody:
<<
Note: forwarded message attached. >>

NOTE: You can't forward things to this group.
If you have something to tell us about your own unschooling life, please do.

If you have a question, great.

I'm in a bad mood, so if this came from someone who's sincere and wonderful
and it was just a little error and I'm overreacting, first weigh how much
time it will take everyone on the list to open that e-mail with no forward
attached and THEN see if it's worth getting grumpy at me.

And to the rest of you: Hi!
I'm trying to get unschoolers in contact with each other again here. I had
taken a few years off (three?) when the boys got tired of helping me maintain
a weekly meeting. But Holly's interested and several families are too, so
I'm back at local activity.

Kirby's going to a prom. For a bit it looked like he was going to two of
them, and he reserved a tux for two weekends, but he's down to just one prom.
Los Alamos High (90 miles away), so not convenient. But the good news is he
saves over $100 by not taking his now-former girlfriend to her high school's
prom.

Sandra
